question: Match Column - I with Column - II. Select the option with correct combination.
| Column - I | Column - II |
| 1 Standing state | p. Mass of living material at a given time |
| 2 Pioneer species | q. Amount of nutrients in the soil at a given time |
| 3 Detritivores | r. Species that invade a bare area |
| 4 Standing crop | s. Breakdown detritus into smaller particles |
explanation: Standing state (1) = Amount of nutrients (q). Pioneer species (2) = Invade bare area (r). Detritivores (3) = Breakdown detritus (s). Standing crop (4) = Mass of living material (p).
